definition: (used for transliteration)/old variant of 謳|讴[ou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐洲|欧洲[Ou1 zhou1]/surname Ou
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

sentences.english: He and the son of Aurora inextricably linked to a fight.
sentences.chinese: 他和歐若拉的兒子進行了一場難分難解的鏖戰。

sentences.english: Keiichi Hori is captain of the icebreaker "Aurora".
sentences.chinese: 堀圭一是歐若拉冰船的船長。
